title: `rustdoc` ICE: Unexpected result when selecting <trait>

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Check out https://github.com/jmaargh/imgui-rs/tree/6b92da44cf43a4afeacb78934827c8b9ce218fa0 and run `cargo doc` (apologies for non-minimal example, but I don't have time to narrow it down right now - especially as it seems to be due to some verbose trait bounds I'm using - and I want to report before I forget). ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.1 (9bc8c42bb 2021-05-09) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9bc8c42bb2f19e745a63f3445f1ac248fb015e53 commit-date: 2021-05-09 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.52.1 LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Unexpected result when selecting OwningRenderer Obligation(predicate=Binder(ProjectionPredicate(ProjectionTy { substs: [G], item_def_id: DefId(31:4660 ~ glow[7586]::HasContext::Buffer) }, _)), depth=2)', compiler/rustc_trait_selection/src/traits/auto_trait.rs:770:33 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic error: Unrecognized option: 'crate-version' error: could not document `imgui-glow-renderer` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --edition=2018 --crate-type lib --crate-name imgui_glow_renderer imgui-glow-renderer/src/lib.rs -o /home/john-mark/repos/imgui-rs/target/doc --cfg 'feature="bind_sampler_support"' --cfg 'feature="bind_vertex_array_support"' --cfg 'feature="clip_origin_support"' --cfg 'feature="default"' --cfg 'feature="gl_extensions_support"' --cfg 'feature="polygon_mode_support"' --cfg 'feature="primitive_restart_support"' --cfg 'feature="vertex_offset_support"' --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi -L dependency=/home/john-mark/repos/imgui-rs/target/debug/deps --extern glow=/home/john-mark/repos/imgui-rs/target/debug/deps/libglow-8894152216d955ec.rmeta --extern imgui=/home/john-mark/repos/imgui-rs/target/debug/deps/libimgui-ba73fe0f5ea74e6b.rmeta --extern memoffset=/home/john-mark/repos/imgui-rs/target/debug/deps/libmemoffset-a0f3543968cf1097.rmeta --crate-version 0.7.0` (exit code: 1) warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/9bc8c42bb2f19e745a63f3445f1ac248fb015e53/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/9bc8c42bb2f19e745a63f3445f1ac248fb015e53/library/std/src/panicking.rs:435:5 2: rustc_trait_selection::traits::auto_trait::AutoTraitFinder::evaluate_nested_obligations 3: rustc_trait_selection::traits::auto_trait::AutoTraitFinder::evaluate_predicates 4: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 5: rustc_trait_selection::traits::auto_trait::AutoTraitFinder::find_auto_trait_generics 6: rustdoc::clean::auto_trait::AutoTraitFinder::generate_for_trait 7: alloc::vec::source_iter_marker:: for alloc::vec::Vec>::from_iter 8: rustdoc::clean::auto_trait::AutoTraitFinder::get_auto_trait_impls 9: rustdoc::clean::utils::get_auto_trait_and_blanket_impls 10: ::fold_item 11: alloc::vec::source_iter_marker:: for alloc::vec::Vec>::from_iter 12: rustdoc::fold::DocFolder::fold_inner_recur 13: ::fold_item 14: rustdoc::passes::collect_trait_impls::collect_trait_impls 15: rustdoc::core::run_global_ctxt 16: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 17: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 18: rustc_span::with_source_map 19: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 20: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
